title: 5 Easy Ways To Get Your Skin Glowing Instantly
text:
facebook 
Due to the harsh winds your skin tends to lose its radiance and, in turn, can make you look tired. But, you don't want to step out of the house with a lack-lustre face. And that is exactly why we are here today, to make your life easier. You don't have to have to put in a lot of effort to get a luminous complexion. These small hacks will give you a glow-from-within, instantly. Boost your complexion 
Gentle exfoliation is important to get a radiant complexion. Try a glycolic acid peel, it contains chemical exfoliators to sweep away dull skin and replace it with a more even, luminous tone. You can use it every other day on a clean, dry face. But use it once a week if you have sensitive skin. Add a dewy drop 
You need constant hydration. Apart from sipping on water, make sure you add a few drops of your favourite face oil. Even if you have oily skin you can use coconut oil to instantly brighten up your complexion. Concentrate on vitamin C 
Use a serum packed with vitamin C. It is one of the best ingredients for us lazy girls. It brightens skin, evens out skin tone, and helps protect against harmful UV rays. Win, win, win. Go for a creamy flush 
A healthy, beachy glow isn't about the time spent basking in the sunlight. Swipe a luminious cream blush on the apples of your cheeks for an energetic, post-run vibe. Give strobing a try 
We are not asking you to contour your face, but adding a creamy highlighter on the highest point of your cheeks and on the tip of your nose will help catch the light and in turn create an optical illusion, lending you a luminous glow.
